name: UICollectionViewDropPlaceholderContext
desc: An object that contains information about a placeholder in the collection view.

items.name: func commitInsertion(dataSourceUpdates: (IndexPath) -> Void) -> Bool
items.desc: Exchanges the placeholder cell for a cell with the final content.

items.name: func setNeedsCellUpdate()
items.desc: Updates the contents of the placeholder cell.

items.name: func deletePlaceholder() -> Bool
items.desc: Removes an unneeded placeholder cell altogether from the collection view.

items.name: var dragItem: UIDragItem
items.desc: The drag item being represented by the placeholder cell.
